edge_1: During the battle, Galvatron battles Optimus and gets autonomously freed from control.
edge_2: Galvatron retreats, vowing to return after being defeated by Optimus in a one-on-one battle during the lockdown.
edge_3: Cade attempts to turn Optimus over to the authorities but instead fixes him, leading Lucas to alert the authorities which results in Attinger's field commanding operative attacking the Yeager farm. However, Optimus and Tessa's secret boyfriend, Irish rally car driver Shane Dyson, rescue the family during the pursuit, and Lucas is killed by one of Lockdown's grenades.

edge_1: During the battle, Galvatron battles Optimus and gets autonomously freed from control.
edge_2: Galvatron retreats, vowing to return after being defeated by Optimus in a one-on-one battle during the lockdown.
edge_3: Tessa's secret boyfriend, Stefan (Shane Dyson), helps Optimus and Tessa during the pursuit against Attinger's field commanding operative.
